jobs.title: Angular Developer
jobs.description: An Angular Developer is responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining dynamic web applications using the Angular framework. They work closely with back-end developers, UI/UX designers, and other stakeholders to create seamless and efficient user experiences.

company.name: Chmsu
company.description: School MIS Web Development Team is responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining the institution's Management Information System (MIS). This system streamlines administrative tasks, student records, faculty management, and academic processes, ensuring efficiency, security, and scalability.

jobs.title: Database Administrator (DBA)
